CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, June 8, 1957, pg. 3 reads: " Family Shows Grief -James Knox Sr., of 7447 Monticello St., and his son, Gregory, 8, look at the damaged bicycle on which James Jr. was riding when he was killed by a car driven by Mrs. Lois Fitzmaurice, of 231 Garlow Dr., Monday, at Idlewild and Collier Sts. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: James Knox Sr. and son, Gregory, standing behind Dark Firestone Deluxe Cruiser bicycle with dented fenders, torn seat, and bent book rack, owned by James Knox Jr.
